item.title: DevOps MOC
item.description: [[devops/gh_contribution|Github: Contribution Workflow]]

item.title: Github: Contribution Workflow
item.description: This note covers the workflow I use to contribute to open-source projects. I am using github.com for simplicity, but basic concepts are the same for all git-based VCS.

item.title: Scale from Zero to Millions of Users
item.description: Single Server Setup The Design of every complex system starts with something simple. Consider a single server setup where everything is running in on one server: web, app, DB, cache, etc.

item.title: The OAuth 2.0 Authorization Framework : Conceptual Overview
item.description: The OAuth 2.0 Authorization framework enables a third-party application to obtain limited access to an HTTP service, either on behalf of a resource owner by orchestrating an approval interaction between the resource owner and the HTTP service, or by allowing the third-party application to obtain access on its own behalf.
